description:
Cash in on: Garage sales, Craigslist & Dumpster diving

All without getting your hands dirty! This course will teach you how to find items for free, and how to flip those items for more money. You will also learn what kinds of items to get and which items to avoid and stay away from. This course is the ultimate guide for students who want to learn how to make money with little or no cash. The course will also show you where to find free things to help you slowly build your way up until you create a sustainable business.

Everyday in America, people are trashing stuff that is worth money. If you are looking for a quick way to get paid and need money fast, this course will show you where to find free stuff, the method for how to do it, and how to turn trash to cash! Not to worry, I am not teaching you to actually go inside the dumpsters. That is totally unsanitary. But I will teach you how to get stuff left next to the dumpster.

Required Equipment

A camera, internet connection and gloves.

Please note

This course includes some lectures from the Craigslist course, and short versions of a few lectures taken from the eBay Powerseller bootcamp course. If you're already enrolled in one of those courses, keep in mind some lectures will be duplicated or has similar content.
title: Ultimate Guide: Garage sales, Craigslist & dumpster diving
